# Banded Mail
## Overview
Banded mail is made up of overlapping strips of metal, fastened to a leather backing. The suit includes gauntlets.


-tx-

|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|

| *Heavy armor* |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Banded mail | 250 gp | +7 | +1 | -6 | 35% | 20 ft.<sup> 2</sup> | 15 ft.<sup> 2</sup> | 35 lbs. |
| |||||||||
| 2 When running in heavy armor, you move only triple your speed, not quadruple. |||||||||

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 150
